{{MNE}} (1 team){{nowrap end}} | no_of_games = 182 | attendance = | TV = | season = | season_champs = {{flagicon|Croatia}} [[KK Cibona|Cibona]] | MVP = {{flagicon|USA}} [[Chester Mason]] ([[HKK Å iroki|Å iroki]]) | MVP_link = | top_scorer = {{flagicon|Croatia}} [[Andrija Å½iÅ¾iÄ]] ([[KK Cedevita|Cedevita]]) (17.12 ppg) | top_scorer_link = | playoffs = | playoffs_link = | conf1 = | conf1_link = | conf1_champ = | conf1-runner-up = | conf2 = | conf2_link = | conf2_champ = | conf2-runner-up = | finals = Final four | finals_link = ABA NLB League 2009â10#Final four | finals_champ = {{flagicon|Serbia}} [[KK Partizan|Partizan]] | finals_runner-up = {{flagicon|Croatia}} [[KK Cibona|Cibona]] | finals_MVP = | finals_MVP_link = | seasonslist = NLB League#Champions | seasonslistnames = NLB League | prevseason_link = ABA NLB League 2008â09 | prevseason_year = 2008â09 | nextseason_link = ABA NLB League 2010â11 | nextseason_year = 2010â11 }} The '''2009â10 Liga AGA''' was the 9th season of the [[Liga ABA]]. 14 teams from [[Serbia]], [[Croatia]], [[Slovenia]], [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]] and [[Montenegro]] participated in the NLB League: Union Olimpija, Helios, Cibona, Zagreb, Zadar, Split, Bosna, Å iroki Eronet, [[KK Partizan|Partizan]], [[KK Crvena Zvezda|Crvena Zvezda]], [[KK FMP|FMP]], [[KK Hemofarm|Hemofarm]], [[KK RadniÄki Kragujevac|RadniÄki Kragujevac]], BuduÄnost.[http://www.adriaticbasket.info/w2/history.php Adriatic Basket History], adriaticbasket.info The [[ABA_NLB_League_2009%E2%80%9310#Final_four|2009-10 NLB League Final Four]] was held on April 23-25, 2010, in [[Arena Zagreb]]. ==Team Information== ===Venues and locations=== {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin-left:0.5em;background: #F9F9F9; [[KK Union Olimpija|Olimpija]]
}} }} ==Regular season== The regular season began on Saturday, October 10, 2009, and ended on Saturday, March 20, 2010.[http://www.adriaticbasket.info/w2/standings_detailed.php Standings - Regular Season], adriaticbasket.info ===Standings=== {{Col-begin}} {{col-break}} {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! !width="180"|Team !Pld !W !L !PF !PA !Diff !Pts |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" | 1||align=left|[[KK Cibona|Cibona]] ||26||20||6||2038||1802||236||46 |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" | 2||align=left|[[KK Partizan|Partizan]] ||26||20||6||2021||1842||179||46 |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" | 3||align=left|[[KK Hemofarm|Hemofarm STADA]] ||26||17||9||2059||1912||147||43 |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" | 4||align=left|[[KK Union Olimpija|Union Olimpija]] ||26||15||11||2004||1875||129||41 |- | 5||align=left|[[KK BuduÄnost Podgorica|BuduÄnost m:tel]] ||26||15||11||1964||1876||88||41 |- | 6||align=left|[[KK Zagreb|Zagreb Croatia osiguranje]] ||26||14||12||2054||2076||-22||40 |- | 7||align=left|[[KK Cedevita Zagreb|Cedevita]] ||26||13||13||2037||2097||-60||39 |- | 8||align=left|[[KK Zadar|Zadar]] ||26||13||13||2118||1960||158||39 |- | 9||align=left|[[KK Crvena Zvezda|Crvena Zvezda]] ||26||11||15||2069||2012||57||37 |- | 10||align=left|[[HKK Å iroki|Å iroki HT Eronet]] ||26||11||15||1949||2013||-64||37 |- | 11||align=left|[[KK RadniÄki|RadniÄki]] ||26||11||15||1826||2008||-182||37 |- | 12||align=left|[[KK FMP|FMP]] ||26||10||16||1965||2055||-90||36 |- | 13||align=left|[[KK Bosna|Bosna ASA BH TELECOM]] ||26||6||20||1778||2053||-275||32 |- bgcolor="#ffdddd" | 14||align=left|[[KK Helios|Helios DomÅ¾ale]] ||26||6||20||1756||2057||-301||32 |} {{col-break}} [[File:Cibona vs Partizan NLB League Final 2010.JPG|thumb|280px|Final game KK Cibona vs. KK Partizan in [[Arena Zagreb]]]]
